name: Monster (itch)
description:
Monster was created for the Second Annual HAWKTOBER Game Jam! With the theme Creature Feature in mind. We had a month to create something and this is what I created. I hope you all enjoy as this is my first attempt at something horror related.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move 
  •  Left Mouse Click - Move
  • Enter - Interacts or continues the conversation
  • Esc - Opens/Exits the Menu
Credits
  • Plugin: Khas Custom Scripts - Here
  • Plugin: Tsukimi Pixi Filter Controller - Here
  • Music: Darren Curtis - Here
